ComicInfo.Tags: Witchblade [Sara Pezzini],Eric Sketh,D. Gavin Taylor (villain),Jake McCarthy,Shine,Lloyd Drexler,Ian Nottingham,Kenneth Irons (villain),Michael Yee [flashback]
ComicInfo.Summary: Sara wakes up from a nightmare about being part of an occult ceremony when she was a baby to discover that she is clutching a new gem for the Witchblade. She connects the gem to her gauntlet with explosive results. Sara finds that Joe Siry has resigned after confessing to the killing of her father. Irons ends his association with Gavin. Jake confronts the former minister and discovers a monster hiding under Gavin's human guise. Irons gives a few words of cold comfort to Ian concerning the death of Setsuke. Sara is meeting with Drexler to find out if Lisa is safe when she is attacked by Shine.
